name: Intellectual Quotient
description: Logical reasoning, systems thinking, abstract modeling.

name: Emotional Quotient
description: Emotional awareness, regulation, empathy, and integration.

name: Relational Quotient
description: Capacity for emotional connection, communication, and healthy bonding.

name: Cultural Quotient
description: Ability to navigate diverse values, norms, identity, and cultural fluency.

name: Spiritual Quotient
description: Awareness of ego, presence, surrender, and transcendence.

name: Physical Quotient
description: Embodiment, health awareness, energy regulation, fitness.

name: Alignment Execution Quotient
description: Acting in sync with values and purpose consistently and sustainably.

name: Adaptability Quotient
description: Ability to navigate uncertainty, pivot, and evolve.

name: Financial Quotient
description: Ability to manage, grow, and apply resources wisely.

name: Resilience Quotient
description: Emotional and mental bounce-back capacity from challenges.

name: Healing Quotient
description: Ability to process trauma, shadow, and evolve emotionally.

name: Creative Quotient
description: Imagination, innovation, originality, and artistic expression.

name: Maturity Quotient
description: Ethical responsibility, grounded leadership, wise self-regulation.

name: Existential Quotient
description: Awareness of mortality, legacy, and life meaning.

name: Kinetic Quotient
description: Somatic intelligence, embodied action, rhythm, and movement-based awareness.
